name: The Child (HorrorShopGames)
description:
A mysterious child brings unrest to her family. "The Child" is a cute, story-focused horror RPG featuring beautiful art, compelling music, and chilling atmosphere.

Get the soundtrack here: https://horrorshopgames.itch.io/the-child-soundtrack

For quick answers, join our discord! https://discord.gg/wQVbsHt

This game includes flashing lights.
